hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that a single #scrub in the crater# sells #a Heart Container#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Hyrule Field# is on the way of the hero.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that the #Forest Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that spinning #Goron pottery# contains #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that ##the Temple of Time## has #1# major item.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# hoards #Bombs (5 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Front Center Bombable Chest

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #a Gold Skulltula Token# can be found at #Lon Lon Ranch#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #Gerudo's Fortress# is on the path to #the Tower#.

HC (Malon).text: I was voted least helpful hint stone five years in a row!

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that plundering #the Desert Colossus# is a foolish choice.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Heart Container#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #the Ice Cavern# is on the way of the hero.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #chests past Dark Link# in the Water Temple hold...^ #Bombs (5 pieces)# and #Bombs (20 pieces)#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Lake Hylia# is on the path to #the Tower#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #the Bolero of Fire#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Child Climb North Chest

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Nayru's Love#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Heart Container#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #the Bolero of Fire#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #Zora's River# is on the path to #the Tower#.
hinted_locations: ZR Near Open Grotto Freestanding PoH

LW (Bridge).text: Never give up. Trust your instincts!

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that the #Spirit Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #the Giant's Knife#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that under the #entrance of the Fire Temple# a blocked path leads to...^ #a Small Key# and #a Small Key#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #wooden walls# in the Shadow Temple hide...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Piece of Heart#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple Spike Walls Left Chest

ToT (Right).text: They say that plundering #the Deku Tree# is a foolish choice.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# hoards #the Sun's Song#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #the Water Temple Boss Key# can be found at #Gerudo Valley#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Nayru's Love#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Bomb Bag# and #a Strength Upgrade#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that ##Hyrule Field## has #2# major items.
